trans-unit.source: Represents the value returned from a database comparison operation between Oracle data types, and exposes methods used to perform data type conversions.
trans-unit.target: Oracle 데이터 형식 간 데이터베이스를 비교한 후 반환되는 값을 나타내거나 데이터 형식을 변환하는 데 사용된 메서드를 노출합니다.

trans-unit.source: The key difference between an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure and a standard **Boolean** value is that, where a standard `Boolean` has two possible values, `true` and `false`, an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure has three possible values, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, or <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>.
trans-unit.target: 주요 차이점은 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> 구조와 표준 **부울** 은 표준 값이 하, `Boolean` 에 두 개의 가능한 값 `true` 및 `false`, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> 구조에 3 가지 가능한 값인 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True>, <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False>, 또는 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure does not map to an Oracle `Boolean` data type; it is exposed as a convenience support class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> 구조는 Oracle에 매핑되지 않는 `Boolean` 으로 편리 하 게 지원 클래스를 노출 되기 데이터 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
The <see langword="Boolean" /> to be used as the initial value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure using the specified <see langword="Boolean" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see langword="Boolean" />를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="integer" /> to be used as the initial value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure using the specified integer.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 정수를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: If `value` is 0, the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise it is `true`.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 두 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체의 비트 AND를 계산합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 논리곱 연산의 결과는 다음 표와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> <paramref name="x" /></term><description>의 값 <paramref name="y" /></description><description>의 값 결과

trans-unit.source: An object to compare, or a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 비교할 개체 또는 null 참조(Visual Basic에서는 <see langword="Nothing" />)입니다.

trans-unit.source: Compares this <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure to a specified object and returns an indication of their relative values.
trans-unit.target: 이 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체를 지정된 개체와 비교하여 상대 값 표시를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A signed number indicating the relative values of the instance and value.
trans-unit.target: 인스턴스와 값의 상대 값을 나타내는 부호 있는 숫자입니다.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
</term><description> Description
</description></listheader><item><term> A negative integer
</term><description> This instance is less than <paramref name="value" />.
</description></item><item><term> Zero
</term><description> This instance is equal to <paramref name="value" />.
</description></item><item><term> A positive integer
</term><description> This instance is greater than <paramref name="value" />.
-or-
<paramref name="value" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" />이 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)인 경우

trans-unit.source: Any instance of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, regardless of its value, is considered greater than a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 모든 인스턴스 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean>, 해당 값에 관계 없이 null 참조일 보다 큰 것으로 간주 됩니다 (`Nothing` Visual basic에서).

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures to determine if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체를 비교하여 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to be compared.
Compares the supplied object parameter to the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
<see langword="true" /> if object is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> and the two are equal; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 개체가 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />의 인스턴스이고 둘이 같으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Compares two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures to determine if they are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 개의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체를 비교하여 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />의 인스턴스 중 하나가 null인 경우 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" />의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />는 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents a false value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> 구조체 인스턴스의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 속성에 할당할 수 있는 False 값을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
Returns the hash code for this instance.
A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
Indicates whether the current <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />.
<see langword="true" /> if <see langword="Value" /> is <see langword="False" />, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Value" />가 <see langword="False" />이면 <see langword="true" />이고 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
Indicates whether or not the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure is null.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> value of the structure is **Null**, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 경우는 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체의 값은 **Null**, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the current <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />.
<see langword="true" /> if <see langword="Value" /> is <see langword="True" />, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Value" />가 <see langword="True" />이면 <see langword="true" />이고 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value%2A> is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null>, this property still is `false`.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Compares two instances of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to determine if they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />의 두 인스턴스를 비교하여 같지 않은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 인스턴스가 같지 않으면 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />이고, 두 인스턴스가 같으면 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />인 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />의 인스턴스 중 하나가 null인 경우 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" />의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />는 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents a null value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> 구조체 인스턴스의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 속성에 할당할 수 있는 null 값을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.

Represents a value of one that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> 구조체 인스턴스의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 속성에 할당할 수 있는 1 값을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.One> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Performs a ones complement operation on the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체에 대해 1의 보수 연산을 수행합니다.

trans-unit.source: The one's complement of the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
If the <see langword="Boolean" /> contains a null value the result also is a null value.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Boolean" />에 null 값이 들어 있으면 결과도 null 값이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Computes the bitwise AND of two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 두 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체의 비트 AND를 계산합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of the logical AND operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 논리곱 연산의 결과는 다음 표와 같습니다.

trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> <paramref name="x" /></term><description>의 값 <paramref name="y" /></description><description>의 값 결과

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Computes the bitwise OR of its two <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> operands.
The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 비트 OR 연산의 결과는 다음 표와 같습니다.

trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> <paramref name="x" /></term><description>의 값 <paramref name="y" /></description><description>의 값 결과

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Or%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
Compares two instances of an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> for equality.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />의 두 인스턴스를 비교하여 같은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are not equal.

If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />의 인스턴스 중 하나가 null인 경우 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" />의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />는 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Equals%28System.Object%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 매개 변수에 대해 비트 배타적 OR 연산을 수행합니다.

trans-unit.source: The results of the bitwise XOR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 비트 배타적 OR 연산의 결과는 다음 표와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> <paramref name="x" /></term><description>의 값 <paramref name="y" /></description><description>의 값 결과

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Xor%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
Used for explicit <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> conversion.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to convert.
Converts an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to a <see langword="Boolean" />.
A <see langword="Boolean" /> set to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> contains a null value.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> to be converted to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Converts the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> parameter to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.

A new <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure whose value equals the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 매개 변수의 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> 속성과 같은 값을 갖는 새 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> is 0, the value of <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `false`; otherwise, the value of the <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 경우의 값은 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber> 은 0으로, 값 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> 은 `false`, 그렇지 않으면 값은 <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> 은 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: A string to be converted to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Converts a string to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.

A new <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure whose value equals the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 매개 변수의 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber.Value" />와 같은 값을 갖는 새 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleNumber" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure to be tested.
Used to test the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to determine whether it is false.
<see langword="true" /> if the supplied parameter <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is false; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 매개 변수 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />이 false이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsFalse?displayProperty=nameWithType>
A <see langword="Boolean" /> value to be converted to <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
Converts a <see langword="Boolean" /> value to an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> value containing 0 or 1.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
Compares two instances of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> for inequality.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />의 두 인스턴스를 비교하여 같지 않은지 여부를 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> that is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if the two instances are not equal or <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> if the two instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: 두 인스턴스가 같지 않으면 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />이고, 두 인스턴스가 같으면 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />인 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If either instance of <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is null, the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />의 인스턴스 중 하나가 null인 경우 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" />의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />는 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />이 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.NotEquals%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%2CSystem.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> on which the NOT operation is performed.
Performs a NOT operation on an <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.

An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> with the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /><see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" /> if argument was true, <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" /> if argument was null, and <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" /> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 인수가 true이면 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />가 <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" />이고, 인수가 null이면 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Null" />인 <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.False" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Performs a one's complement operation on the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
The one's complement of the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.OnesComplement%28System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
The <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure to be tested.
Used to test the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> to determine whether it is true.
<see langword="true" /> if the supplied parameter <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is true; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 매개 변수 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />이 true이면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.IsTrue?displayProperty=nameWithType>
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Performs a bitwise OR operation on the two specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structures.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 두 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 구조체에 대해 비트 OR 연산을 수행합니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of the bitwise OR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 비트 OR 연산의 결과는 다음 표와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> <paramref name="x" /></term><description>의 값 <paramref name="y" /></description><description>의 값 결과

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.String" /> to be converted.
Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of a logical value to its <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 논리 값의 지정된 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 표현을 같은 값의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />으로 변환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure containing the parsed value.
Converts the current <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> to a string.
A string containing the value of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" />.
If the value is null, the string contains a null value.
trans-unit.target: 값이 null이면 null 값이 문자열에 포함됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Represents a true value that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> 구조체 인스턴스의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 속성에 할당할 수 있는 True 값을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure's value.
This property is read-only.
<see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> is <see cref="F:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.True" />; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
Performs a bitwise exclusive-OR operation on the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 제공된 매개 변수에 대해 비트 배타적 OR 연산을 수행합니다.

trans-unit.source: The results of the logical XOR operation as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 논리 XOR 연산의 결과는 다음 표와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value of <paramref name="x" /></term><description> Value of <paramref name="y" /></description><description> Result
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> <paramref name="x" /></term><description>의 값 <paramref name="y" /></description><description>의 값 결과

trans-unit.source: Represents a value of zero that can be assigned to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> property of an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Value" /> 구조체 인스턴스의 <see cref="T:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean" /> 속성에 할당할 수 있는 0 값을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean.Zero> field is an <xref:System.Data.OracleClient.OracleBoolean> structure constant.
